title: Kimi ni Sasayaku Mirai
sinopse:
Wonderful stories revolving around a pair of lovers and their friends.

1. Kimi ni Sasayaku Mirai (The Future I Whisper to You)
2. Kimi ni Sasayaku Rakuen (The Paradise I Whisper to You)
3. Kimi ni Sasayaku Kodoku (The Loneliness I Whisper to You)
4. Kimi ni Sasayaku Setsuna (The Moment That You Whisper)
5. Fuseijitsu na Anata (Pretentious You)
